===  Documentation ===

        
			Descriptive elements for the shaft of a golf club.
		
----
      
  	
===  Properties ===

  	This component is not nillable.
----

	<...  `type`=golfml:GolfClubTypeEnum>
            ( manufacturer, model, submodel?, length?, weight?, tip?   )
  </...>
